sentence.Network_en: Conclusion: Patients commonly required revision hip arthroscopy because of persistent impingement.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 病人因为持续的损伤通常都要求髋关节镜检查修复.

sentence.Network_en: Through ankle arthroscopy, the debridement and fusion of tibiotalar joint was performed.

sentence.Network_en: Hypothesis: Revision hip arthroscopy is associated with unaddressed femoroacetabular impingement.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 关节镜检查（arthroscopy）是应用于关节腔内部检查的一种内镜，借助它可以直接观察滑膜、软骨、半月板与韧带，特别是通过关节 …
关节镜手术（Arthroscopy） 在半身麻醉下进行。手术方式一般是在膝盖骨下方刺两个小于一公分的小切口，其中一个供关节镜伸入…
关节镜(Arthroscopy)是骨科一种先进的检查和手术设备,用于关节内疾病的观察,诊断和治疗,二十世纪七十年代关节镜应用于临床后,许多患者都乐意接受关节镜检查和镜视.
膝关节镜（Arthroscopy）  病人在全身或半身麻醉下

list.abs: study limitations include failure to use arthroscopy as a gold standard , and cross-sectional design , limiting the ability to make longitudinal inferences .研究的限制因素，包含未使用膝关节镜作为标准，为一横断面的设计，纵断面的评估受到限制。

hypothesis : revision hip arthroscopy is associated with unaddressed femoroacetabular impingement . the purpose of this study was to describe reasons for revision hip arthroscopy .假设：髋关节镜治疗术后翻修与股骨髋臼侵犯有关。本研究目的为探讨髋关节镜治疗术后翻修原因。
